ygData.subject: SV: taking the ghoulbane plunge
ygData.msgSnippet: Good job Cenaleb! This is Avron btw :) I am going to plunge deep today and pray I get lucky, I am getting tired of camping it hehe.. - Avron - ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Good job Cenaleb! This is Avron btw :) I am going to plunge deep today and pray I get lucky, I am getting tired of camping it hehe..

- Avron -

----- Original Message -----
From: Alexander G. <smerte@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 27, 1999 2:12 PM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] taking the ghoulbane plunge


> From: "Alexander G." <smerte@...>
>
> I am happye to anounce that I aquired me a Ghoulbane yesterday on the
> Solusek Ro server. I have been camping it from time to time since lvl.
> 30 with little luck. Got a couple of silverplated bracers that I have
> distributed to the ppl. helping me.
> Yesterday our party consisted of: me 35pal, 35 ranger, 28 wiz, 27
> shaman.
> I have some 1hs to work on now since I have been using a bibs since
> lvl 24. <G>
>
> >From what I have heard the effect wont work until lvl. 30.
>
>
> -
> Cenaleb Crystalwind
> 35 pal on Solusek Ro
>
> >
